channel.title: Vagrant on Insights for Action
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant on Insights for Action

item.title: Configuration management
item.description: One thing I have learnt is configuration management. It’s an under-rated aspect of reproducible research. I was quickly experimenting with an R package, but needed to install the sf package on my tinkering machine. That in turn required another R package units. And in turn, units needed some header files, as did sf. As it turns out, units package failed with a very nice error message telling me exactly what I had to do.
